В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, часть средств будет направленна на ремонт грузового автомобиля необходимого в хозяйстве, а также на покупку семян и удобрений для обработки почвы. Развитие бизнеса поможет Бурайме приобрести дополнительный земельный участок.
texts.en: Buraima successfully repaid her last loan after using it as intended. She is grateful to the Kiva Fund and everyone, who helped her with the financing. Today, Buraima's farm contains 4 cows and 7 sheep. She grows corn for sale on 20 hectares of land and also has a mini cafe, where Buraima sells samosas, piroshki and ginger bread. Buraima's monthly income amounts to about 17,000 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 135,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy livestock and also to repair a truck used for the farm, as well as buy seeds and fertilizers to cultivate the land. Developing this business will help Buraima to buy an additional land plot.

loans.use: to buy livestock and also to repair a truck used for the farm, as well as buy seeds and fertilizers to cultivate the land

loans.name: Paizilatkhan

texts.ru: Пайзилатхан, 57 лет, замужем, воспитала 3 детей. Пайзилатхан много лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть 6 коров, 1 овца. На участке мерою 2,10 Га она выращивает хлопок и другие сельскохозяйственные продукты. Благодаря упорному труду Пайзилатхан, ее ежемесячная совокупная прибыль составляет до 20,000 сом (KGS). Она решила развить ее бизнес и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья овец. Доходы от кредита позволят ей улучшить благосостояние ее семьи и подготовиться к полевым работам.
texts.en: Paizilatkhan is 57 years old, married and raised 3 children. Paizilatkhan has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for many years. Her farm contains 6 cows and 1 sheep. She grows cotton and other agricultural crops on 2.10 hectares of land. Thanks to Paizilatkhan's hard work, her combined monthly profit amounts up to 20,000 som (KGS). She decided to develop her business and requested a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to increase her sheep headcount. The earnings from the loan will allow her to improve her family's welfare and prepare for field farming work.

loans.use: to buy additional sheep in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Friendship2 Group

texts.en:
Freindship2 is a group comprised of three hardworking Filipinas; Elena, the group’s leader, is at the right, while Mayrose is in the center and Marites to the left. These women left their homes in the Philippines to establish businesses to support their families back home.

Elena is the group's featured borrower. She is 65 years old, married and the mother of four children. She sells clothing and is dedicated to supporting her family and covering their needs as much as she can.

Elena has obtained a 1,400 USD loan through Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, which will be apportioned among the three women. She will use her share to augment her merchandise with special spring and summer clothes, perfumes and accessories. She is very enthusiastic about this loan and is looking forward to developing her business further.

loans.use: to augment her merchandise with special spring and summer clothes, perfumes and accessories.

loans.name: Kishimzhan

texts.ru: Кишимжан, 57 лет, вдова, мать 4 детей. Образование - среднее. Много лет проработала дояркой, также занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря ее непосильному труду и емкой работе, Кишимжан достигла успехов в развитии хозяйства и стала получать ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 1около 18,000 сом (KGS), в том числе пенсионные платежи. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Кишимжан имеется 2 коровы, 13 овец, 3 козы, также 4,20 Га собственной земли, где она выращивает клевер для реализации. Доходы Кишимжан низкие, их не хватает на достойную жизнь. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 лошадей. Доходы от кредита Кишимжан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота в своем хозяйстве, чтобы иметь возможность улучшить благосостояние ее семьи.
texts.en: Kishimzhan is 57 years old, a widow and a mother of 4 children. She has a secondary education. She spent many years working as a milkmaid and is also involved in animal husbandry and farming. Thanks to her backbreaking labor and great work, Kishimzhan achieved successes in developing her business and began to earn a monthly profit of approximately 18,000 som (KGS) in addition to her pension payments. Today, Kishimzhan's farm contains 2 cows, 13 sheep, 3 goats and also 4.20 hectares of her own land, where she grows clover for sale. Kishimzhan's earnings are low and not enough for a decent life. To continue developing her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy 2 horses. Kishimzhan plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing her livestock headcount on her farm in order to be able to improve her family's welfare.

loans.use: to buy two horses in order to increase her profit and family's welfare

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru:
Эту красивую девушку зовут Мадина. Ей всено 20 лет. Она жительница района Яван. Мадина замужем,  но пока не имеет детей. Она живет вместе мужем и матерью на районе. Мадина самостоятельная девушка как ее муж. Она обладает мастерством кройки и шитья. Уже на протяжении 3 года Мадина занимается пошивом женских платьев национального стиля. Мадина любить свою деятельность и хорошо справляется с ней. По ее словам ей удобно шить на дому, так как она дополнительно может делать работу по домашнему хозяйству и помочь маме. 
Данный момент Мадина хочет купить многофункциональную швейную машинку модели  «YAMATA», чтобы ускорить процесс работы и увеличить ежедневный доход. Мадина хочет стать хорошим швеей и в будущем планирует расширить швейное дело. Мадина надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
The name of this beautiful young woman is Madina. She is only 20 years old. She is a resident of the Yavan district. Madina is married, but does not yet have children. She lives with her husband and mother in the district. Madina is just as independent as her husband is. She is very skilled in sewing. Madina has been involved in sewing national-style women's dresses for 3 years. Madina loves her business and handles it well. According to her, it is convenient to sew at home because she can additionally do household work and help her mother.

Madina currently wants to purchase a multifunctional sewing machine Yamata in order to speed up her work process and increase her daily income. Madina wants to become a good seamstress and plans to expand her sewing business in the future. Madina hopes for Your support.

loans.use: to purchase a multifunctional sewing machine Yamata

loans.name: Salamat

texts.ru: Саламат, 28 лет, замужем. У нее среднее образование. На протяжении многих лет в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается разведением скота и  полеводством. У Саламат в хозяйстве есть корова и 6 овец. На 1,48 Га земли она выращивает фасоль для реализации. Саламат известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 14,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычка для откорма и реализации. Саламат является лидером группы "Сезон", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства и намерена в будущем построить сарай.
texts.en: Salamat is 28 years old and married. She has a secondary education. To provide additional income for her family, she has been involved in breeding livestock and farming for many years. Salamat's farm contains a cow and 6 sheep. She grows beans for sale on 1.48 hectares of land. Salamat is known as an honest, decent, reliable person with strong principles. Today, her business yields a monthly profit in the amount of 14,000 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 25,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy a bull for fattening up and resale. Salamat is the leader of the Season group that, besides her, consists of 2 more people, with 3 of them altogether. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to develop her business and intends to build a barn in the future.

loans.use: to buy a bull for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Lilia Rosa

texts.es:
Lilia es una persona muy trabajadora siempre tiene una sonrisa para los clientes que visitan su tienda de abarrotes en el municipio de Sincelejo.

Gracias a su carisma y buen humor se ha podido ganar el corazón y reconocimiento de las personas del sector que siempre prefieren visitar su tienda para adquirir sus productos.

Todos los días trabaja para darles una buena calidad de vida  a sus 4 hijos por los cuales aspira a darles un excelente futuro.
Trabaja sola durante 12 horas todos los días.

Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar como granos, abarrotes, golosinas, bebidas, entre otros y de esta forma darle un impulso significativo a su negocio.

Ella guarda la esperanza de poder continuar con su negocio y así seguir impactando la vida de sus clientes a través de su buen servicio.
texts.en:
Lilia is a very hardworking person. She always has a smile for the customers that visit her grocery store in the Sincelejo municipality.  

Thanks to her charisma and good humor, she has managed to earn the heart and acknowledgement of the people of the sector that always prefer to visit her store to get her products.

She works every day to give a good quality of life to her 4 children to which she aspires to give an excellent future. She works by herself for 12 hours every day.

She is currently requesting a loan for the purchase of an assortment of family staple products like grains, groceries, candy, drinks, among others, and this way, give a significant impulse to her business.  

She hopes to be able to continue with her business and keep impacting the life of her customers through her good service.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of family staple products like grains, groceries, candy, drinks, among others, and this way, give a significant impulse to her business.

loans.name: Zhainagul

texts.ru: Жайнагул, 39 лет, замужем. У нее высшее образование, работала учителем, сейчас в декретном отпуске. На протяжении многих лет в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается разведением скота и  полеводством. У Жайнагул в хозяйстве есть корова и 10 овец. На 1,14 Га собственной и 2,0 Га арендованной земли она выращивает фасоль для реализации. На сегодняшний день деятельность Жайнагул приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 13,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для полеводства и выращивания органической фасоли. Жайнагул является участником группы "Сезон", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства и намерена в будущем увеличить поголовье дойных коров.
texts.en: Zhainagul is 39 years old and married. She has a college education and worked as a teacher, and is currently on maternity leave. To provide additional income for her family, she is involved in breeding livestock and farming for many years. Zhainagul's farm contains a cow and 10 sheep. She grows beans for sale on 1.14 hectares of her own and 2.0 hectares of leased land. Today, Zhainagul's business yields a monthly profit in the amount of 13,000 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy fertilizers for farming and growing organic beans. Zhainagul is a member of the Season group that, besides her consists of 2 more people, with 3 of them altogether. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to develop her business and intends to increase her headcount of dairy cows in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for farming and growing organic beans

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгуль, 41 год, замужем. У нее среднее образование. На протяжении 15 лет в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается разведением скота и полеводством. У Назгуль в хозяйстве есть корова, на 1,11 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли она выращивает фасоль для реализации. На сегодняшний день деятельность Назгуль приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 12,800 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для полеводства и выращивания органической фасоли. Назгуль является участником группы "Сезон", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Доходы от кредита она направит на ремонт дома и увеличение площади орошаемых земель.
texts.en: Nazgul is 41 years old and married. She has a secondary education. To provide additional income for her family, she has been involved in breeding livestock and farming for 15 years. Nazgul's farm contains a cow and 1.11 hectares of her own and 1.0 hectare of leased land, where she grows beans for sale. Today, Nazgul's business yields a monthly profit of 12,800 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy fertilizers for farming and growing organic beans. Nazgul is a member of the Season group that, besides her, consists of 2 more people, with 3 of them altogether. She will use the earnings from the loan to repair her house and increase her irrigated land area.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for farming and growing organic beans

loans.name: Prossy

texts.en:
Prossy is 51 years old and lives in the town of Bulenga in the Kampala region of Uganda. She is married and has four children, with two of them currently in school. For the past six years, Prossy has been working hard to manage her bar. 

To help expand her business, Prossy has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy a pool table and alcohol, and will help Prossy to generate greater profits and business expansion. Prossy hopes that in the future, she will be able to add profits.

loans.use: buy a pool table and alcohol

loans.name: Al Aheba Aley Group

texts.en:
Ebtissam is the featured borrower for Al Aheba Aley Group. She got along with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living at the same time.

Ebtissam is a 60-year-old single lady who has a grocery shop and works as a tailor, too, in order to satisfy her needs and expenses. She has always been an independent and ambitious lady who is capable of satisfying her needs without any help. 

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to develop her grocery shop and increase her business merchandise with more requested products and items for the upcoming summer season. 

Ebtissam is the first lady on the left of the photo. With respect to the other group members, Radiya is the first lady on the right, and Maliha is the lady sitting in the middle.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with products and items for the summer season

loans.name: Yai's Group

texts.en:
Yai, 41, is living in Mondulkiri province. She is the mother of three children, and two of them are in school, while the other one is too young to get in school. To overcome her family’s hardship, she grows cassava and works on other farms to get a fee. She has been involved in this business for nine years, and she could earn about 101,900 KHR per day. 

Now, she is leading a group to take a loan via VisionFund to pay for the plowing fee. She hopes to earn more money and have the ability to buy more farmland to expand her farming area.

loans.use: to pay for the plowing fee

loans.name: Khushbagoy

texts.ru: Хушбагой 51 летняя счастливая жена и мать. Ее муж находится на заработках вместе двумя сыновьям в Российской Федерации, потому что он не нашел себе подходящую работу в стране. У нее большая семья. Хушбагой мать четверых сыновей и двоих дочери. Она дехканка и очень трудолюбивая женщина. Хушбагой занимается земледелием, где имеет земельный участок. Она с детства занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. 25 лет уже Хушбагой сажает урожай. Хушбагой так зарабатывает, и обеспечить семью. Сейчас Хушбагой готовить землю для посева нового урожай.  Вперед посева надо обработать землю минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить качественный и богатый урожай. Хушбагой решила взять кредит и купить достаточного количества минеральных удобрений. Она заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Khushbagoy is a 51-year-old happy wife and mother. Her husband and two sons are working in the Russian Federation because he could not find suitable work in his own country. She has a big family. Khushbagoy is a mother of four sons and two daughters. She is a dekhan farmer and a very hardworking woman. Khushbagoy is involved in farming and has a land plot. She has been involved in agriculture since her childhood. Khushbagoy has been planting crops for 25 years. This is how Khushbagoy earns a living and provides for her family. Now Khushbagoy is preparing her land for sowing the next crop. Prior to sowing the crop, she has to cultivate the land with mineral fertilizers in order to gather a quality and rich harvest. Khushbagoy decided to obtain a loan and buy enough mineral fertilizers. She expresses her gratitude in advance.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and cultivate her land

loans.name: Abdurahmon

texts.ru:
Абдурахмон мужчина  55 лет, женат,отец четверых сыновей и пятнадцати внуков. Вот уже на протяжение двадцати с лишним лет Абдурахмон занимается земледелием. У него огромный участок в 20 с лишним гектаров земли, где он выращивает виноград  всех сортов. Весь урожай после сборки Абдурахмон очищает и относит на рынок. Он не справляется один на таком огромном участке, поэтому ему помогают его сыновья. Также АБдурахмон занимается и животноводством. У него 2 коровы и 3 барана. Его жена каждое утро доит коров и продает  молоко на рынке.
Абдурахмон любит свою работу,ему нравится собирать урожай вручную, пробовать его на вкус, отбирать лучшие сорта.
Сейчас Абдурахмон хочет оплодотворить почву, но у него нет полной суммы денег. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Заранее благодарит за доверие.
texts.en: Abdurahmon is a 55-year-old married man, a father of four sons and a grandfather of fifteen grandchildren. Abdurahmon has been involved in farming for over twenty years. He has a large land plot of over 20 hectares, where he grows all varieties of grapes. Abdurahmon cleans all the harvest after gathering it and takes it to a market. Because he cannot manage such a large plot of land by himself, his sons help him. Abdurahmon is also involved in animal husbandry. He has 2 cows and 3 sheep. His wife milks the cows every morning and sells the milk at a market. Abdurahmon loves his work and likes to gather the harvest manually, taste it and pick the best varieties. Now Abdurahmon wants to cultivate his land, but does not have the needed amount of money.This is why he requested financial support from MDO Arvand. He is grateful in advance for the trust.

loans.use: to fertilize his land

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Israel es un hombre trabajador de 64 años de edad, está casado y tiene 2 hijos pero solo uno vive con él pues el mayor ya está casado. 

Anteriormente, Israel trabajó como albañil, pero ahora trabaja en la alcaldía de su comunidad como auxiliar de servicios.

Él solicita este crédito para comprar ladrillos, cemento y arena para construir un muro en su casa, con el objetivo de evitar que el agua ingrese durante el invierno.

Él espera cumplir su meta de mejorar su casa poco a poco y tener fuerzas para seguir trabajando pues ya está bastante mayor.
texts.en:
Israel is 64 years old and hard-working. He is married and has two children, only one of whom still lives at whom while the eldest is married.

Israel used to work as a builder but now works at the local town hall as a maintenance assistant.

He is applying for this loan in order to buy bricks, cement and sand to build a wall in his house, which he hopes will prevent water seeping into the house during the winter.

Israel hopes to achieve his goal of improving his house little by little. Now that his is older, he wants to maintain the strength to continue working.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement and sand to build a wall in his house.

loans.name: Ledy Margoth

texts.es:
Con sus manos trabajadoras, Ledy ha luchado fuertemente para otorgarles a sus 3 hijos la oportunidad de que puedan estudiar y poder realizarse como personas.

Ella es una mujer amable y tiene un negocio de venta de desayunos y almuerzos en el municipio de Sincelejo.

De este negocio dependen sus hijos y su futuro. Es por eta razón que solicita un apoyo económico para la compra de insumos e ingredientes como carne, arroz, verduras, granos, entre otros, así podrá tener una mayor cantidad de insumos disponibles para la preparación de sus alimentos.

Apoya a Ledy a sacar adelante su negocio con un préstamo.
texts.en:
Using her hard-working hands, Ledy has worked hard to give her three children the opportunity to study and to develop as people.

Ledy is friendly and has a business selling breakfasts and lunches in the municipality of Sincelejo.

Ledy’s children and their future depend on this business. She is therefore applying for a loan in order to buy meat, rice, vegetables, grains and more so that she has more supplies at the ready to prepare meals.

Help Ledy with a loan to move her business forward!

loans.use: to buy meat, rice, vegetables, grains and more in order to have more supplies at the ready to prepare her meals.

loans.name: Baktykan

texts.ru: Бактыкан, 63 года, замужем, есть сын и 2 внуков. Бактыкан занимается животноводством. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 8 овец, лошадь. Благодаря упорному труду, Бактыкан на сегодняшний день имеет прибыль до 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма. Доходы от кредита Бактыкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Baktykan is 63 years old, married and has one son and two grandchildren. She works with livestock breeding. Her farm has two cows, eight sheep and a horse. Thanks to persistent work, Baktykan currently has an income up to 15,000 som (KGS) per month. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Baktykan turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS) to purchase sheep for breeding. She plans to invest the income from the loan in further developing her business and in renovating her home.

loans.use: to purchase sheep for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Alison

texts.en:
Alison is a woman eager to get ahead. She is a 35-year-old mother who lives with her family in the Nkubu area of Kenya. She is blessed with a lovely family who are her greatest motivation in life to persevere, because she wants to provide them with a better future. 

Alison was unable to study to get a professional career because of the economic situation that her family faced. However, she never gave up and she has been practicing farming for the past 10 years. She is an early riser who goes to her farm to earn a living. 

Alison has space on her farm to use for banana farming, so she respectfully requests a loan to buy banana seedlings to plant. Nkubu is an area that has a large population and there is a high demand for bananas. Alison, being an enterprising person, wants to take full advantage of that need and earn extra income.

She hopes that this loan will allow her to change her standard of living and expand her banana-selling business to other markets nearby. She wants to be economically empowered. She knows that accessing funds is challenging, but with partners such as Juhudi Kilimo and Kiva, she feels relieved to know that all her dreams will be achieved and she will be able to provide a secure future for her children and improve her family's living conditions. Alison patiently awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy banana seedlings, to ensure a secure future for her children and be economically empowered as a woman

loans.name: Jehad

texts.en:
Jehad is a 27-years-old married man from Rafah city. He is a father of two sons and two daughters. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. Jehad also has a grocery store where he sells basic grocery products.

Jehad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new refrigerator for his grocery store. this will enable Jehad to buy more soft drinks for his store to resell.

Jehad appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new refrigerator for his grocery store.

loans.name: Daris

texts.en:
Daris is a 31 years old, married to Esther and he supports 4 family members.
 
He has been a carpenter for the last 4 years and the business earns him a monthly income of KES 10,000. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya which he plans to purchase more pieces of timber for making chairs and tables for sale to his customers. 

He plans to use gained profit to repay the loan and expand his business. 

His hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: To purchase more pieces of timber for making chairs and tables for sale to his customers.

loans.name: Bahrihon

texts.en:
Bahrihon is a wise woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1959 in the family of workers. She is living in remote district with her family. She is married and has four children. For more than ten years she has done business in a domestic market buying and selling perfumer products, jewelry accessories, cosmetics, etc.

Bahrihon is planning to buy a new assortment of goods to her store. She asked a loan from KIVA lenders to buy perfumer products, jewelry accessories, cosmetics, etc. She awaits KIVA lenders kindness. Doing business helps her family budget additional income.

loans.use: to buy perfumer products, jewelry accessories, cosmetics, etc., to add to her family's income

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a power saw for cutting timber, which will expand his agricultural actvities

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stocks of charcoal for sale in the market and meet the demand of clients in the market.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
For more than 10 years now, Alma has been raising and selling hogs. She is 41 year old married woman with 2 dependents children ages 10 and 15 year old respectively. She lives in Loboc, Bohol. Her husband earns a living by being a driver.  She is in need of capital to support her source of income.

Alma has requested a loan to buy piglets and pig feed. These would help Alma's hog raising business improve. She could now raise more pigs  and able sold more  quantity in few months to come. Thus, she could now provide her child with basic needs including quality education.

She is hoping that she could be successful in handling her business in the years to come for sustainable  livelihood.

loans.use: to buy piglets and pig feed, to help with the education of her children

loans.name: Sokhom's Group

texts.en:
Sokhom, 39, is a mother-of-three children, and two of them are in school, living in Mondulkiri province. 

Cassava farming and paid worker are the sources of her family’s income for twelve years. Due to the lack of funds, she in now leading a group to take a new loan with VisionFund to buy farming supplies for doing farming. 

She hopes to improve her family’s standard of living through this loan.

loans.use: to buy cassava farming supplies, to improve her family's standard of living

loans.name: Elvin

texts.en:
Elvin is a handsome man. He was born in Baku in 1996. He is living in a small town in a family of workers. 

He was an active student at school and graduated with excellence. He had a dream to enter University and get a higher education. Elvin made a choice to major in geology, than decided to widen his knowledge and was interested to study medical biology. 

He is used to studying and being active in order to become a good specialist and be useful to his motherland. His parents are simple workers. His mother is a teacher at a secondary school and his father is a butcher. It is hard to find a good place to work because the average salary here is not enough to feed a family monthly. 

They do not have money to pay his tuition fees. Elvin asked for a loan from KIVA lenders to pay his higher education costs and finish his studies in order to become a specialist. He hopes to achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to pay his higher education costs in medical biology

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a 32 years old, married to Joseph and she supports 4 family members. 

She has been selling different fruits in the market for the last 5 years and the business earns her a monthly income of KES 11,000. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya which she plans to purchase additional stock of fruits in season like bananas, oranges and passion fruit for sale in the market.

She plans to use gained profit to repay the loan and start a retail shop. 

Her hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of fruits in season, like bananas, oranges and passion fuit for sale in the market

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more stocks of clothes for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional pieces of timber for making chairs and tables, to expand his business

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
This is Elma . She is 39 years old and currently resides with her husband, Marvin, in Caloocan City, Philippines. She has been operating her own variety store for more than ten years, and she profits well from this. Having a bigger responsibility requires more effort to provide for her family's needs, especially for her children. She and her partner had to work hard, determined to have a better income, to provide their children with a better education.

To improve sales, Elma  would like to apply for a loan to purchase additional goods and relative products to sell. At an amount of 50,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos), she could already purchase larger quantities and more varieties of merchandise items like onions, rice, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. She sincerely lets you know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Elma  hopes to maintain an increasing profit from her business. Through this, she can someday then help other people who are in need. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God, which she studies. 

*All CCT (Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To purchase larger quantities and more varieties of merchandise items to sell.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Sometimes, dreams are the only things you can have in life. And just like any other man, Rosa also dreams. Wanting to make her children complete schooling someday and expand her business, she is doing now her very best to excel with her craft. 

Rosa is 43 years old. She is married to Johnny, a driver, and they have three kids. Currently, Rosa is busy operating her direct-selling business. She is selling different kinds of products, mostly, personal product sales like soaps, lotion, perfumes and detergents, dishwashing soaps and the like. The profit she gets from the business becomes a great help for their family basically in terms of their daily expenses. 

To further improve the business, she wants to ask for a 16,000 PHP loan which she will use for buying more products to sell. With this, she can surely gain more income and part of what she will gain, she will save for future investments and part will be used for their everyday living.  

You’ll be a great blessing in advance. Thanks for your heartfelt generosity and goodness. 
Rosa  meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To buy more personal products to sell, to help with everyday living

loans.name: Tunashukuru Group

texts.fr: Antoinette est une commerçante, secrétaire d’une banque villageoise «Tunashukuru», célibataire, dynamique, âgée de 34 ans. Elle est une vendeuse des produits pharmaceutiques. Elle installe sa marchandise dans une pharmacie non loin du centre ville. Elle débuta avec de fonds reçu de ses parents. Plus tard, elle bénéficia le prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 14 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter des antibiotiques, antipaludéens, anti-inflammatoires, etc. Ainsi, elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, accroitre son activité. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneuses non bancables.
texts.en: Antoinette is a trader and secretary of the "Tunashukuru" Banc Villageois. She is a dynamic single woman, who is 34 years old, and she sells pharmaceutical products. She sets up her goods in a pharmacy near to the centre of town. She began her business with funds given to her by her parents. She subsequently benefited from a loan from IMF Hekima. She has been carrying out this activity for the past 14 years, and she is going to use this new loan to buy antibiotics, anti-malaria drugs, anti-inflammatories, etc. By doing so, she would like to be able to buy a plot of land and expand her business. Finally she is extremely grateful to Hekima for giving autonomy to female entrepreneurs who do not have access to banks.

loans.use: to buy boxes of antibiotics, anti-malaria drugs, anti-inflammatory medication, etc.

loans.name: Bon Samaritain Group

texts.fr: Bilembo est une commerçante, membre d’un collectif de crédits «Bon Samaritain», âgé de 47 ans, mariée à un chauffeur qui l’aida pour débuter son business, mère de 6 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle est vendeuse des boissons sucrées dans un dépôt dans la ville depuis 7 ans. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre ses activités. Elle va s’approvisionner en 20 caisses de sucrées. Ainsi, elle souhaite scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs exclus du système bancaire classique.
texts.en: Bilembo is a trader and member of the "Bon Samaritain" (Good Samaritan) loan collective. She is 47 years old and married to a driver, who helped her to set up her business. She has six children, who are all at school. She has been selling sugary drinks in a store in the town for the past seven years. She is requesting a loan from Hekima to expand her business. She is going to stock up with 20 crates of sugary drinks. By doing this, she would like to be able to educate and feed her children. She thanks Hekima for the support it provides to entrepreneurs who are unable to access the classic bank system.

loans.use: to stock up with 20 crates of sugary drinks.

loans.name: Al Sadaka Group

texts.en:
Souzan is the featured borrower for Al Sadaka Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living at the same time.

Souzan is a 45-year-old married mother of two children. She works in selling cosmetics, make up and perfumes to help her husband in satisfying their children's needs. 

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with new collection of cosmetics and make up to satisfy her customers' special needs. 

Souzan is the first lady on the left, Lamis is the second lady on the left, Boushra is the second lady on the right, and Rodayna is the first lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of cosmetics and make up, for her customer's special needs

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en:
Estelita is vendor from Tagbilaran, City, Bohol. She sells seaweeds and sea shells to earn for a living.
She is 37 year old  married woman with five children. Her oldest child is 18 and the youngest is 3.  

She is asking for a loan to purchase variety of seaweeds, seashells and cellophane . These  will help increase the supplies in which she could sell variety of those items. With these, she could now able to augment her income and provide the needs of her growing children.
 
She hopes that she could handle her resources properly to be able to finance the schooling of her children and 
improve her livelihood as well.

loans.use: to purchase variety of seaweeds, seashells and cellophane, to help finance the education of her children

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur. Mary ann is 38 years old and has three children are still in school.

Mary Ann has a construction supplies business in the Philippines. Mary Ann requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to buy cement, sand, and gravel to use in her cement block making business.

Mary Ann has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel to use in her cement block making business

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es:
Carlos ha tenido que soportar muchísimas adversidades en el proceso de desarrollo de su negocio.

Hoy en día vive en una humilde casa y se gana la vida vendiendo artículos para el hogar como canecas, traperas, poncheras, entre otros, una actividad que aprendió de manera empírica con el afán de conseguir el sustento para su familia.
Le dedica 8 horas diarias a su negocio.
El solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de surtido de escobas, limpiones, utensilios de cocina, entre otros, para abastecer su inventario y tener un mejor capital.

Con este préstamo podrá ofrecer sus productos y mejorar sus ventas de una manera considerable.

Es un hombre fuerte y con gran espíritu emprendedor.
texts.en:
Carlos has had to endure many setbacks in the process of developing his business. 

Now he lives in a modest house and makes a living selling household items such as containers, mops and party bowls amongst other items. This is a job he learnt how to do by experience with the aim of feeding his family.

He spends 8 hours on his business every day.  

He is asking for a loan to buy a range of brooms, dishcloths, and cooking utensils among other items to stock his inventory and improve his income. 

With this loan he will be able to offer his products to customers and improve his sales by a considerable amount. 

He is a strong man with a great enterprising spirit.

loans.use: to buy a range of brooms, dishcloths, and cooking utensils among other items to stock his inventory and improve his income.

loans.name: Sohibo

texts.en:
Sohibo is a strong woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1967. She is living in northern part of Tajikistan in 1967. She is married and has five children. Her family is big. 

She is doing business in agriculture for many years. She buys, feeds, keeps and trades sheep in market. She knows well her activity and takes care about her sheep in order to have them grow them well. 

The standard of living and condition where she lives with her family is poor; she wants to make it better and asked a loan from Kiva lenders to buy construction supplies as blocks, cement, armature, etc. to renovate her house. She awaits Kiva lenders kindness.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies of blocks, cement, armature, etc. so that she may renovate her house

loans.name: Pendeza Group

texts.fr: Niyibizi est commerçante qui s’entraide avec son mari, membre de la banque villageoise «Pendeza», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 33 ans, mère 7 enfants dont 5 étudient et 2 sont gosses. Elle commença son business avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires dans un marché de la ville depuis 12 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en pommes de terre. Elle souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables. Nous tenons a signaler que certaines clientes portenet leurs bébés.
texts.en: Niyibizi is a trader who helps out her husband. She is a member of the Pendeza Banc Villageois and a customer of IMF Hekima, and she is married, 33 years old and mother to seven children, five of whom are studying while the other two are still very young. She began her business with funds from her husband, and she has been selling food products in one of the town's markets for the past 12 years. She is going to get fresh supplies of potatoes. She would like to be able to buy a plot of land, as well as to educate and feed her children. Finally she is grateful to Hekima for the support it provides to entrepreneurs who cannot access banks. It should be noted that some of the customers in the photo are carrying their babies.

loans.use: to get supplies of potatoes.

loans.name: Rea Ann

texts.en:
Rea Ann is 26 years old and married with two children. With one child is still in school, Rea Ann works very hard to provide for them.

Rea Ann runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like milk, coffee, spices, canned goods and other personal care products.

Rea Ann has been in this business for 5 years.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell like milk, coffee, spices, canned goods and other personal care products

loans.name: Ayoko

texts.fr: Âgée de 43 ans, Ayoko est une femme mariée qui habite à Adamavo. Pour exercer une activité, Ayoko vend des charbons de bois et trouve son gain favorable. Ayoko s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Pour acheter des sacs de charbons de bois, Ayoko nécessite ce prêt pour financer sa commande et réaliser plus de gains pour l’épanouissement de son foyer.
texts.en: Ayoko is 43 years old, married and lives in Adamayo. She sells charcoal as a business and finds it to be a profitable one. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. Ayoko needs this loan to finance the purchase of sacks of charcoal and to make more money to help her household thrive.

loans.use: to buy 12 sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Dionis Del Carmen

texts.es:
Dionis es una mujer de 57 años de edad, ella es soltera es ama de casa y cabeza de familia, madre de 3 hijos dos de ellos ya con familia y el menor que vive y depende de ella, se dedica a la cría de aves, un negocio que aprendió de su madre y que a lo largo de su vida le ha dado el alimento de cada día.

Ella vende gallinas criollas, son gallinas coloradas (ver foto) alimentadas únicamente de maíz, estás gallinas son las más solicitadas, por su rico sabor y porque son muy  corpulentas, está es una profesión que ha realizado toda su vida y la que quiere seguir haciendo hasta que su salud se lo permita, por ello solicita un préstamo para la compra de 100 gallinas y maíz para alimentarlas, este le seguirá asegurando un futuro porque tiene clientes, solo necesita del capital.

Tu préstamo le permitirá a esta humilde y trabajadora mujer seguir realizando la profesión que le ha dado de comer toda su vida.
texts.en:
Dionis is a 57-year-old woman. She is single and works taking care of her family and of the household chores. She has three children; two of them have their own family and one still depends on her. Dionis raises domesticated birds, something she learned from her mother, and that has helped her to bring food to her family’s table every day.

She sells a local, red-colored breed of chickens (see photo). She only feeds them corn. These chickens are highly demanded because of their delicious taste and because they have a lot of meat. She has raised chickens her whole life and wants to continue doing it while her health is good.

This is why Dionis is requesting a loan to buy 100 chickens and corn to feed them. The future of her business is bright because she has many customers; she just needs capital.

Your loan will help this humble and hardworking woman to continue with the business that has helped her to bring food to the table all her life.

loans.use: to buy 100 chickens and corn to feed them.

loans.name: Alba Arely

texts.es: Alba es una mujer luchadora que desde hace 8 años se gana la vida con su venta de ropa actividad que realiza todos los días recorriendo las calles de su municipio y aprovechando cada lugar accesible para mostrar su mercadería. Alba vive con su compañero de vida desde hace 5 años, por lo que se siente feliz, ya que a base de sacrificio han logrado construir su hogar. Alba desea incrementar su mercadería ya que para las fiestas del día de la madre las ventas son mejores, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: faldas, blusas, camisetas, ropa interior, etc., y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Alba is a tenacious woman who has earned a living for eight years selling clothing as a street vendor. She walks along the streets in town making the best of any accessible space to display her merchandise.

She has been living with her life partner for the last five years, and she feels happy that she has been able to set up home through her sacrifices.

Alba would like to expand her stock because the sales are better during Mother's Day festivities. She's requesting the loan from FUSAI to invest in skirts, blouses, shirts, underwear, and more, so that she can improve her income.

loans.use: to invest in skirts, blouses, shirts, underwear, and more, and in this way improve her income.

loans.name: Godofreda

texts.en:
Godofreda has been raising pigs for two years now. She lives in the town of Sikatuna, Bohol, in the Philippines and is married with four children aged 24 to 15 years old. Her husband earns a living by farming.

Godofreda has requested a loan to buy another two piglets, which will enable her to boost her business. Thus, she will be able to improve her earnings and venture into other businesses in the future. Thus, she will be able to provide her children with good food and better living conditions.

Godofreda is dedicated to expanding her pig raising business to become financially stable in the years to come.

loans.use: to buy another two piglets

loans.name: Artak

texts.en:
Artak is 46 years old and he lives in the frontier village of Getahovit in the Tavush region of Armenia. He lives here with his parents (they are pensioners), his wife and two school-aged children. Artak has a higher education, having graduated from the State Agricultural Institute. He has worked in different places and done various jobs but since 1990 he has been farming, while also sometimes doing different construction jobs in his village. 
Artak says he is especially interested in pig breeding. On his farm he now has pigs and piglets, cows and also a lot of chickens. He sells milk, pork, poultry and eggs. In addition, he cultivates his land, growing potatoes, garlic, onion and greens, which his mother sells to their neighbors. Artak will be happy if Kiva lenders support him financially to develop his pig breeding. Artak wants to use this loan to buy several pigs and also fodder for his cattle.

loans.use: to buy several pigs and fodder for his cattle

loans.name: Jalyn

texts.en:
Jalyn is a 34-year-old single woman with four children, three of whom are still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who has a dried fish making business in the Philippines. She has requested an 18,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish and other materials for her business.

Jalyn has been selling dried fish for 15 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish and other materials for her business

loans.name: Luis Angel

texts.es:
Luis desde hace 19 años se dedica a la producción agrícola de café y diariamente se levanta para trabajar y atender sus tierras.

Es una actividad heredada de su familia y poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando sus técnicas y habilidades en este campo.

Adicionalmente genera ingresos alternos gracias a su trabajo como jornalero.
Hoy en día se siente orgulloso de lo que ha podido construir con su esfuerzo y se siente muy agradecido con la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva por las oportunidades que le brindan de progresar.

El pide un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de abonos, riegos y pesticidas, de este modo mantener sus tierras en optimas condiciones para los cultivos.

Su mayor sueño es pagar la educación de sus hijos y poder disfrutar de su vejez al lado de su familia..
texts.en:
Since he was 19 years old, Luis has devoted himself to the agricultural production of coffee and every day he gets up to work in and maintain his fields. This is an activity that he inherited from his family  and little by little he has perfected his techniques and skills in this trade. In addition, he earns extra income thanks to his work as a laborer. Today he feels proud of what he has been able to build with his efforts and he is very thankful for the Interactuar Corporation and the Kiva lenders for the opportunities they provide to get ahead. 

Luis is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of fertilizers, irrigation and pesticides in order to maintain his land in optimal condition for his crops. His greatest dream is to pay for the education of his children and to be able to enjoy his old age at his family's side.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, irrigation and pesticides in order to maintain his land in optimal condition for his crops.

loans.name: Javier De Jesus

texts.es:
Javier tiene en su sangra el empuje y fuerza para trabajar, a pesar sus 65 años, aun se siente con toda la energía del mundo.

Es padre de 8 hijos menores y mayores por los cuales trabaja incansablemente para ofrecerles una vida digna.

Los ingresos los obtiene de su trabajo como agricultor y porcicultor, pero este trabajo ha sido difícil por la competencia que se vive en las veredas del municipio de Bello.

Javier solicita humildemente un apoyo para poder comprar lechones y alimento para los mismo, de este forma intentara superar estas dificultades y tendrá un mejor capital para trabajar.
texts.en:
For Javier, the strength and determination to work run in his blood. At age 65, he still has all the energy in the world. He's the father of eight children, adults and minors, and he works relentlessly to offer them a decent life.

He earns a living in agriculture and porciculture, but this work has been difficult due to the competition experienced in the rural settlements of the Bello municipality.

Javier is humbly requesting assistance to buy piglets and feed for the same. He will thus look to overcome the difficulties, and he will have a better capital to work with.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed for the same. In this way, he will attempt to overcome his difficulties.

loans.name: Enadis

texts.es:
Enadis es un joven de 19 años de edad, emprendedora y trabajadora, tiene un pequeño de 3 años por el cual luchar y superarse y gracias a su negociod e venta de pescado puede generar el sustento para llevar el alimento de cada día.

Sus principales sueños son pagar la educación de sus hijos, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y esto lo quiere hacer en base a su negocio, mejorando las ventas, incrementando su utilidad, aumentando sus clientes, para ello necesita capital de trabajo, pero como de momento no cuenta con este solicita un prestado y en este se apoyara mucho ya que comprara surtido de pescado el cual distribuye por su sector cargando una nevera de icopor portable y el resto del capital lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos para tener esta nueva fuerza de venta.
texts.en:
Enadis is a 19 year old young woman who is entrepreneurial and a hard workers. She has a little one who is 3 years old for whom she strives and succeeds and thanks to her business selling fish she is able to generate a living to bring food to the table each day. 

Her primary dreams are to pay for the education of her children and to improve the condition of her home. She wishes to do this through her business by improving her sales, increasing her profits and growing her client base. To do this she needs working capital, however, currently she cannot count on any. She is seeking a loan which will support her a lot because she will purchase a variety of fish which she will distribute in her community by carrying a portable styrofoam fridge. The rest of the capital she will invest in the purchase of pigs in order to have a new source of sales.

loans.use: to purchase fish and a cart to make it easier to transport them.

loans.name: Busaira

texts.ru: Бусайра, 64 года, замужем, сын живет с родителями, остальные дети на заработках. У Бусайры - среднее образование. Она занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1985 году назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Бусайры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 6 коров, 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход Бусайры составляет 22,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Бусайра планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Busaira is a 64-year-old married woman who lives with her husband and one son. Her other children are away earning money as seasonal workers. Busaira has a high school degree. Having started out in 1985 by buying livestock for a sum of 10,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS), she makes her living from breeding liverstock. Through her hard work, Busaira owns six cows and twenty sheep. Her monthly income is 22,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS). Busaira is requesting a loan of 100,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tusihm bank in order to expand her business. Busaira is requesting a loan of 100,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tusihm bank in order to expand her business. The loan will help her to buy additional cows in order to increase her herd. She plans to invest the profit in the purchase of more livestock.

loans.use: to buy additional cows in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Juana Ignacia

texts.es:
Juana de 47  años viuda con seis hijos cuatro mayores independientes y dos de sus hijos que aún son dependientes. A raíz de la muerte de su esposo Juana decide generar un ingreso para el sustento de su hogar es allí donde emprende su negocio de venta de refrescos y raspadillas de manera ambulatoria. Con los ingresos de sus ventas Juana solventa la educación y alimentación de sus hijos. Una de sus metas de Juana es poder construir su casita para poder dar una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos. El crédito será invertido en la compra de baldes, vasos y jarras para dar una buena atención a sus clientes.
Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por el apoyo recibido.
texts.en:
Juana, 47 years old, is a widow with six children, four are independent adults and two of her children are still dependents. From the death of her husband, Juana decided to generate income to sustain her household and it is there where she undertook her business selling soft drinks and snow cones as a street vendor. With the income from her sales, Juana pays for her children's education and food. One of Juana's goals is to be able to build a small house to be able to give her children a good quality of life. The loan will be invested in the purchase of buckets, glasses, and jugs to be able to provide good customer service.

She is grateful to the Kiva investors for the support received.

loans.use: to purchase glasses, buckets and jugs.

loans.name: Elmer Yovani

texts.es:
Elmer Yovani tiene 38 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se caracteriza por grandes depósitos de arena y ripio que su población utiliza para construcciones de viviendas, la comunidad se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi desde hace más de cinco años por lo que es conocido en la zona contando con buenas referencias personales y laborales en este distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de repuestos para su vehículo y de esta manera seguir brindando un servicio seguro a sus clientes lo que le generará ingresos mayores que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer Yovani is 38 years old and lives with his wife and children in Cayalti district, a community characterized by the large sand and gravel deposits which its population uses to build houses. The community works in agriculture, trade and animal husbandry and it is located in Chiclayo province, which is in Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. 

He has worked offering public transportation service on his own motorcycle taxi for over five years, so he is known in the zone and has good personal and work references in this district. He has asked for a loan to purchase spare parts for his vehicle and in this way continue offering safe services for his customers which will generate more income that will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Santos Saturdino

texts.es:
Santos tiene 49 años de edad, es separado, vive en casa propia en el distrito de Cañaris, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de arroz en buen estado en etapa de sembrado, adicionalmente se dedica a las labores agrícolas, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino será para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de arroz, con esto Santos espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le generará ingresos mayores que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 49 years old, separated, and lives in his own house in Cañaris district, a community which works in agriculture and animal husbandry, and is located in Ferreñafe province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

He works in agriculture and has rice crops in good condition in the planted stage. In addition, he does agricultural work, he has good experience in this business and with good personal and work references in his district. The money will be used to purchase manure and fertilizers to maintain his rice crop. With this, Santos hopes to offer a better product to his customers which will generate more income which will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizer to maintain his rice crop.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 43 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su esposa e hija en casa familiar en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana del distrito de Zaña, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de carga, cuenta con moto carguera propia, se dedica a este negocio desde hace más de 1 año por lo que cuenta con experiencia y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para realizar arreglos y reparaciones a su moto carguera ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, de esta manera el espera hacer crecer más su negocio, obtener más ingresos y poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 43 years old, in a common-law marriage, and lives with his wife and daughter in the family house in a large community in the urban zone of Zaña district, a  community which works in agriculture and animal husbandry and is located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

He works offering cargo transportation. He has his own cargo motorcycle, and he has worked in this business for more than a year, so he has experience and good personal and work references in his district. He asks for the loan to make some repairs to his cargo motorcycle since it is currently in bad condition. In this way, he hopes to make his business grow more, get more income, and be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to make some repairs on his cargo motorcycle since it is currently in bad condition.

loans.name: Zhanna

texts.en:
This woman’s name is Zhanna and she lives Sevan city of Gegharkunik region. Zhanna graduated pedagogical college and now she works at the school as a teacher of elementary classes. Zhanna is married and she lives with her husband (he is unemployed) and her daughter (she works as an accountant). 

Zhanna hopes that Kiva lenders will pay attention to her request, since she needs this loan in order to pass a course of treatment. So this loan of 400.000 Armenian drams will help Zhanna to recover and be back to her beloved work at the school.

loans.use: to pass a course of medical treatment

loans.name: Ma. Lisa

texts.en:
Ma. Lisa is 51 years old and a single woman.

Ma. Lisa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks and other personal care products.

Ma. Lisa has been in this business for 5 years.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks and other personal care products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a manicure table, a mirror and hairdressing supplies, enamels, shampoo and masks, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To install various electronic machines in his office to assist in repair.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his farming activity by using certified seeds and improved fertilizers

loans.name: Merdeta

texts.en:
Merdeta works hard to support her family. Merdeta is married and has a dried fish making business in the Philippines.

Merdeta requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish and other materials to her business.

Merdeta has been in this business for 6 years now.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish and other materials for her dried fish business

loans.name: Mher

texts.en:
Mher is 28 years old and he lives with his big family in the Kapan city of Syunik region. Mher lives with his parents, two brother and grandmother. Nobody from his family is employed; only he sometimes does different paid constructional work. 

Farming is the main source of income for his family. Here he has cows, heifers, calves, a bull, beehives and chickens. He also has a hay field which provides hay for his farm cattle. In all, Mher from his farm sells not a small assortment of farm products such as milk, macun (national-dairy product), meat, honey and eggs. All these his mother sells locally. 

Mher will be happy if he manages to receive this Kiva loan, which he will use in order to buy diesel fuel, fodder for his chickens, also wax papers and some special medicine for his bees.

loans.use: to buy diesel fuel, fodder for his chickens, also wax papers and some special medicine for his bees

loans.name: Arpine

texts.en:
This nice lady’s name is Arpine and she is 21 years old. She lives in the village Lchashen of Gegharkunik region. Arpine lives there with her father and brother. Her family income comes from farming, which is her father’s main occupation. Arpine’s brother is a builder, but he is also engaged in farming and agriculture. 

As Arpine mentions, her father and brother do their best in order to provide their family with good living conditions, and among many needs ,they work very hard in order to cover her education costs. 

Arpine is at her fourth year of studying at the State Pedagogical Institute and in future she will become a journalist. She studies at the paid division and at this moment the lack of money does not allow her family to pay for her education. 

She will be greatly happy and pleased if Kiva lenders support her with the loan of 180.000 Armenian drams, with which she will pay her tuition fee for the second semester.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees for the second semester of college, so that she may become a journalist

loans.name: Thueba

texts.en:
Thueba is married with four school going children. They live at their own house that  neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

She has operated a Khanga ( women wrap cloth) selling business, selling from home and door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of lack of capital to expand her business.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of Khanga’s for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of khanga’s (women's wrap arounds)  for resale

loans.name: Shushanik

texts.en:
Shushanik is 44 years old and with her husband and son, she lives in the village of Zovaber in the Gegharkunik region. Shushanik has a vocational medical education and for many years she worked at the kinder-garden as a nurse, but now her only occupation is farming which she manages with her husband and son. On the farm, Shushanik has a cow, a pig, sheep, lambs and chickens. With the help of her husband, Shushanik sells milk, meat (pork, mutton and poultry) and eggs from her farm. On her plot of land Shushanik cultivates potatoes, which re-sellers buy right from her house. 

Shushanik asks a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams as she wants to enlarge the number of her farm animals with one more pig and one bull.

loans.use: to enlarge the number of her farm animals with one more pig and one bull

loans.name: Tigran

texts.en:
Tigran is a butcher and he has been  working in this field for 15 years already. In Vanadzor city of the Lori region, Tigran rents a small shop where he sells a great assortment of meat: beef, pork, mutton, and poultry. 

All the products for his shop Tigran buys only from farmers whom he has known for a very long period of time, and he is sure that the meat he buys from those farmers is fresh and of high quality. 

Tigran has a lot of regular customers who have been visiting his shop for many years. 

Tigran is married and he lives with his wife and two daughters. This loan he requests because he has a new idea; he wants to buy a special grill oven in which he will make tasty meat to  sell from his shop warm and fresh. For the purchase of this machine he asks a loan of 300 AMD (Armenian drams), and he will be very thankful to receive it.

loans.use: to buy a special grill oven in which he will make tasty meat

loans.name: Hayarpi

texts.en:
Hayarpi is 22 years old and she lives in the village of Zovaber of Gegharkunik region. She is just married, and her husband being unemployed has gone to the Russian Federation to work abroad. Hayarpi now lives with her mother-in-law and her husband’s grandmother.  

In the village, her family is engaged in farming and earns their living from the sale of farm products such as milk, meat and eggs. Hayarpi is a student; she is in her fourth year of studying at the State Pedagogical University at the faculty of methodology of teaching of elementary classes. 

She studies at the paid division and she will be very thankful if Kiva lenders give her this loan of 215,000 Armenian drams, in order to pay her tuition fee for the second semester.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fee for the second semester

loans.name: Silvera

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma’s agents, Silvera. Silvera lives in North Bogor, located about a one hour and thirty minute drive from Jakarta, the capital city. She lives there with her husband. 

Silvera owns a stall where she sells daily consumer products, small snacks and mobile air time credits for her community. She wanted to join Ruma because, as a woman, she wants to help her husband improve their life and learn about how to manage another business opportunity, as well as give more contribution to her community. Her community sees Silvera as a trusted and friendly mobile provider.

As the business grows, Silvera is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile air time credits for her community, so her community can easily access their loved ones, no matter how far apart they are. 

As seen in the photo, Silvera is the one who is standing in her own small stall. She will be thankful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase additional prepaid airtime credit to sell to community members who want to use mobile phones to connect with loved ones.

loans.name: Jose Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar, de 55 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, está casado y su pareja es sastre, tiene 2 hijos pero solo su hija de 9 años de edad vive con ellos.

Oscar, tiene 40 años de experiencia en la pesca artesanal, cuando se dio el conflicto armado, estuvo en el ejercito por 7 años; él también tiene cerdos para criarlos y para venderlos, tiene la ventaja de vivir en la bahia, su compañera de vida cuando no tiene trabajo de costura, le ayuda a comercializar el pescado, él pesca de 3 a 4 veces por semana y son turnos de 24 horas. 

Oscar, necesita el crédito para comprar pescado, un trasmallo y unos cerdos para engordarlos.

El sueño de Oscar, es que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad de vida, también sueña con tener una casa de ladrillo.
texts.en:
Oscar, 55 years old, went to school up to the eighth grade, is married and his wife is a seamstress. They have two children, but only their 9-year-old daughter lives with them.

Oscar has 40 years of experience in traditional fishing. When the armed conflict happened, he was in the army for 7 years. He also has pigs to raise and sell. He has the advantage of living in the bay. His life partner, when she doesn't have sewing work, helps him to sell the fish. He fishes 3-4 times per week and they are 24 hour shifts. 

Oscar needs the loan to purchase fish, a trammel net, and some pigs to fatten.

Oscar's dream is that his children have a better quality of life. He also dreams of having a brick house.

loans.use: to purchase fish, a trammel net, and some pigs to fatten.

loans.name: Dewi

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma agents, Dewi. Dewi lives in Sukabumi, a city located at the foot of Mount Gede in West Java, about 80 km (50 mi) south of the national capital, Jakarta. She lives there with her husband and her son. She owns a small stall where she sells daily consumer products and mobile airtime credits for her community. Dewi is a cheerful and hardworking woman and her customers see her as a trusted mobile provider.

Dewi knew Ruma from Ruma sales executive who came to her stall and she decided to join Ruma because she wants to learn to expand her business. With a support from Ruma’s staff, Dewi sees some improvements in her business. As the business grows, Dewi is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile payment services to her community, especially on weekends. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Dewi improve her business and accordingly, her community which needs access to such services, so her community can easily connect with their loved ones, no matter how far they are apart.

As seen in the photo, Dewi is the one who is smiling and standing in front of her own small stall. She is very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to purchase additional prepaid airtime credit to sell to community members who want to use mobile phones to connect with loved ones.

loans.name: Firas

texts.en:
Firas is a 21-year-old single man, who started a year ago a new business in the construction field specialized in painting. He is a hard worker and ambitious man, who has a good reputation among his customers and for his professional skills.

Today, Firas is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy new painting rolls and other tools that will facilitate his business and improve his living conditions.

Firas hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and become able to build his future.

loans.use: to buy new painting rolls and other tools, that will facilitate his business and help build a future for himself

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional carpentry equipment so as to make quality furniture and improve his carpentry shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her beauty salon and equip it with a blow drier and hair drier

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean has run a sari-sari(variety) store to sell noodles, canned goods, sugar, spices, and toiletries for 10 years. She is married and has 3 grown children. She lives in Corella, Bohol.

Jean has requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to purchase assorted groceries, rice, and feed. These are essential tools that would help enhance the content of her store. This will cause to attract more buyers to come and purchase. 

She is grateful for the funds which will enable her to do her best to become successful in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase assorted groceries, rice, and feed.

loans.name: Ashirhon

texts.ru: Аширхон, 47 лет, замужем, 3 детей. Она ведет собственное дело, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи- занимается продажей овощей и фруктов на рынке. Есть склад, еще один павильон сдает в аренду, картофель для реализации она выращивает сама на 0,34 Га земли. Благодаря упорному труду Аширхон, ее ежемесячный доход составляет до 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Аширхон обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товара в обороте. Аширхон является лидером группы "Оомат-3", в которой кроме нее состоит еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и ремонт дома.
texts.en: Ashirhon is a 47-year-old married woman with three children. She has her own business. While her primary source of income is fruit and vegetable sales at the local market, she also rents out a storehouse and a pavilion and grows potatoes on her 0,34 ha plot of land. Through her hard work, she has a monthly income of up to 20,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS). Ashirhon is requesting a loan of 100,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tusihm bank in order to buy more vegrtables and fruits for resale and so to expand her goods turnover. Ashirhon is the leader of the Oomat-3 group, which consists of three borrowers. She plans to invest the profit from the loan in further expansion of her business as well as house renovation.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and fruits for resale

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Doña Leonor tiene 31 años de edad, es madre de tres niños, los cuales son estudiantes de primaria y asisten a cursos de inglés que paga doña Leonor gracias a las ganancias que tiene en su actividad productiva. Ella se dedica a vender productos por catálogo, su fuerte son perfumes y ropa interior. Ella ha sido muy responsable con las obligaciones adquiridas en Fundación Mujer con los dos créditos anteriores. Inició esta actividad con el fin de poder generar ingresos al hogar ya que el salario que ingresa de su compañero sentimental, no es suficiente para los gastos presentes en el hogar.
Ella cuenta con tres años de experiencia en sus ventas. Necesita una inyección de capital  para mejorar como comerciante. Vende en forma ambulante, atendiendo clientas asalariadas y amas de casa, logrando consolidar su cartera de clientes en San Vito centro y barrios aledaños. Asegura no preocuparse por la competencia ya que los productos que ofrece son de calidad, a buen precio y facilidad de pagos.
En un futuro espera contar con un espacio acondicionado en su casa para exhibir los productos y que las clientas tengan un punto de referencia donde llegar a comprar los productos que ella ofrece.
texts.en:
Leonor is 31 years old, the mother of three children, who are primary school students and go to English classes which Leonor pays for thanks to the earnings that she has from her business. She works selling catalog products. Her strengths are perfumes and lingerie. She has been very responsible with the obligations acquired in Fundación Mujer with the two previous loans. She began this business with the goal of being able to generate income for the household since the salary that her partner earns is not enough to pay for the household expenses.

She has three years of experience in her sales. She needs an injection of capital to improve as a businesswoman. She sells as a street vendor, serving salaried customers and housewives, managing to strengthen her customer base in central San Vito and in nearby neighborhoods. She says that she is not concerned about competition since the products she offers are of good quality, good price, and with payment terms.

In the future she hopes to have an outfitted space in her house to show the products and so her customers have a reference point where they can come to purchase the products that she offers.

loans.use: to purchase products that her customers have ordered.

loans.name: Zena

texts.en:
Zena is a married woman and owns a house that  has electricity and running water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.
